image_requirements.description: Show the products in a bright and fresh environment to convey high-quality, clean products.
Photograph each unique and meaningful side of the product package, presenting the side(s) with centered branding.
Products should be evenly lit from side to side and top to bottom to accurately represent the item.
Items should be clipped from the background and retouched to remove any imperfections.
Be selective about props and avoid distracting elements in photos.
Encourage diversity in talent; show models engaging with the product naturally.

summary: The document outlines guidelines for photo direction in apparel styling, emphasizing the importance of setting, angles, lighting, post-production, props, and model usage to create high-quality product imagery.
